summary:
Tired of stupid lydia, with her nagging and stupid fighting style, then come to the follower\'s house!
We accept all advernturers to gain a loyal follower, or a faithful dog!
descriptionHtml:
Tired of stupid lydia, with her nagging and stupid fighting style, then come to the follower\'s house!
We accept all advernturers to gain a loyal follower, or a faithful dog!

Located outside of whiterun is the follower\'s house, full of different races and classes of people to help you with your travels.

Good luck, and happy adventuring.

This mod uses vanilla characters and should be compatible with any other mod. If you find a mod that this is not compatible with, please comment below.

---Bugs---
None reported yet, please comment if you find any bugs.
------------

---Next update---
Add another follower for healing purposes.
Update the basement to be used for more convential means.
----------------------

Please endorse if you like the mod! Thank you :)
author: Yuvvm
